name: Gordon AI
description: Gordon AI is an LLM-powered crypto intelligence platform that evaluates and rates token calls submitted by the community. Users receive $GGAI rewards for every call, along with a full analysis report. The best calls are tracked, traded by Gordon, and ranked on a leaderboard for additional rewards and reputation. With integration on X (formerly Twitter), users can tag Gordon for instant token insights. The projectâ€™s goal is to become the leading platform for alpha sharing and trusted on-chain discovery.
